name: Atomic Crash
description:
Instructions

Dodge protons and neutrons to stay alive. Fly around particles to score points. More points for circling more massive objects.

Controls

Completely mouse driven.

Additional Info

Originally made for Crash jam 2016. Never released then for some reason.

There used to be a related mobile app you could use to mess around with, but that is now defunct.

Team

HuvaaKoodia - Programming
Jan - Programming
Diogo - Hud Programming
Toni - Back-End Programming
Tommi - Graphics and Shader Effects

Music: Sci Fi, bensound.com
